name: Muffin Park
description:
Will you outlive your friends?

How to play

Player 1 : WASD (or ZQSD)

Player 2: IJKL

In the menu, press SPACE to randomize the enemies!

Enemy types 

Normal - Cruve - Split - Grow - Laser

The longer you survive, the more enemies spawn.

Suggestions? Questions? Want to just talk?
Hit me up at julien.giovinazzo@gmail.com

Made with <3 by Julien G
